div.p: I saw finance always as a challenge and in finance to work in the business and the finance environment has always been a challenge
and also a passion for me like I said I’m new to the work and because in my previous role I was a finance administrator in income,
an income officer, and that started as a work experience and then as the time went by I started learning and learning and learning
and enjoying it more and that’s the most important because I’m young, I’m still young, and that’s what I enjoy learning and kind of working with
great people and having great people to work with around you and I enjoy making my family proud of me, you know, of coming here
from a difficult background and going through everything by myself and achieving everything by myself it's a big thing for me
it’s really important because nobody thought I would have, from my circumstances, be where I am today...
